long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Zeko.ai Auto Invite Extension for LinkedIn

Enhance your LinkedIn networking with the Zeko.ai Auto Invite Chrome Extension. Designed and crafted by the innovative team at Zeko.ai, this extension streamlines your connection process by sending automated invites to LinkedIn profiles relevant to your needs.

How to Use:

1. Download the extension from the Chrome Web Store.
2. Visit https://zeko.ai/discover
3. Log in or create an account.
4. Request to search for candidates.
5. Set up your invitation message and what you're looking for.
6. The extension will automatically send invites for you.
